footer.title: Gustoso
footer.description: Delicious food for every mood. Experience the taste of perfection with our handcrafted delicacies.

login.signin: Sign in to access your account
login.crete: Create an account to start your culinary journey

aboutherosection.title: Welcome to Gustoso
aboutherosection.description: At Gustoso, we don't just serve food – we

storySegments.title: The Beginning
storySegments.content: Gustoso was born from a simple dream – to bring authentic, soulful cuisine to your table, made with fresh ingredients and time-honored recipes. What began as a small family-owned restaurant has grown into a culinary destination loved by locals and visitors alike.

storySegments.title: Growing Reputation
storySegments.content: From humble beginnings in a cozy corner of the city, Gustoso quickly became known for its vibrant flavors, warm atmosphere, and commitment to quality. Our name, 'Gustoso' – meaning tasty or flavorful in Italian – reflects everything we stand for.

storySegments.title: Culinary Excellence
storySegments.content: As we've grown over the years, we've remained true to our founding principles: sourcing the finest ingredients, preparing them with care, and serving them with pride. Our chefs blend traditional techniques with modern creativity, resulting in dishes that honor their heritage while delighting contemporary palates.

storySegments.title: Our Legacy
storySegments.content: Each dish tells a story – of family gatherings, of seasonal celebrations, of culinary traditions passed down through generations. Today, Gustoso continues to evolve while staying rooted in what matters most: creating memorable dining experiences that nourish both body and soul.

abouthistory.discription: A culinary journey spanning a decade, crafting memorable experiences and exquisite flavors
abouthistory.storydis: Where time-honored recipes meet contemporary culinary artistry, creating unforgettable dining experiences since 2015.
abouthistory.readdiscription: Whether you're a first-time visitor or a regular guest, we welcome you to our table with open arms and warm hearts. Every meal is an opportunity to create memories.

customerReviews.name: Amit S.
customerReviews.review: One of the best dining experiences I've ever had! The pasta was out of this world and the staff was incredibly friendly.

customerReviews.name: Riya M.
customerReviews.review: If you're looking for flavor, this is the place. The ambiance is cozy and the food is authentic.

customerReviews.name: Karan T.
customerReviews.review: Gustoso is a hidden gem. You can taste the love in every bite.

customerReviews.name: Priya D.
customerReviews.review: Every dish tells a story here. The chef's special changes weekly, and I've never been disappointed. My family and I drive an hour just to eat here regularly.

customerreview.dis: Discover why our guests keep coming back to experience the unforgettable flavors at Gustoso.

popularDishes.name: Spaghetti with Anchovies
popularDishes.description: Fresh spaghetti with anchovies, tomatoes, and white wine sauce

popularDishes.name: Artisan Pizza Margherita
popularDishes.description: Thin crust pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil, and San Marzano tomatoes

popularDishes.name: Risotto al Tartufo
popularDishes.description: Creamy Arborio rice with truffle, porcini mushrooms, and Parmigiano-Reggiano

popularDishes.name: Tiramisu Classico
popularDishes.description: Classic Italian dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream
